Lisa and Raymond came back from school went to home .
and their mother said we're gonna eat out .
where would you like to go ?
and they both shouted Mcdonalds .
so they hoped in the car and drove to Mcdonalds .
Raymond couldn't decide between a Big_Mac or a happy meal .
and Lisa ordered a happy meal .
I forget what Lisa ordered.
and Raymond finally made up her mind and got a happy meal with coke and a vanilla icecream cone .
and her mother ordered a salad .
and the total amount was twelve dollars something cents .
so then their mother reached for her purse .
and it wasn't there .
she remembered that she had left it on the couch at home .
Ryan woke up looked at his clock .
he went in the kitchen .
and he found some cereal .
while he was pouring his milk into the bowl he was looking at the clock .
and he overfilled the bowl with milk .
then he got dressed and tied his shoe .
and one of the laces broke off .
then he got his backpack and started to run towards the school bus .
but it was too late .
so then he hadta walk to school .
when he went to school his +...
he walked up the steps .
and his teacher was telling him that he was late .
the end .
Jenny and Jeff went on a walk to the park .
and they were in the bushes when they saw a u_f_o land on the grass .
and four strange aliens came out .
one was waving .
one was holding a son .
the other was holding all the luggage .
and the son was holding a leash to the alien dog .
Jenny wanted to go meet them .
but Jeff didn't let her .
he pulled her back .
the two family looked like they were okay .
so they wanted to go meet with them .
and they had a fun time .
the end .
